程序包 org.janusgraph.graphdb.query

类 QueryUtil

java.lang.Object
org.janusgraph.graphdb.query.QueryUtil
public class QueryUtil
extends Object
Utility methods used in query optimization and processing.
作者:
Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

      public static boolean isQueryNormalForm​(Condition<?> condition)
      Query-normal-form (QNF) for JanusGraph is a variant of CNF (conjunctive normal form) with negation inlined where possible

    • constraints2QNF

      public static <E extends JanusGraphElement> And<E> constraints2QNF​(StandardJanusGraphTx tx, List<PredicateCondition<String,​E>> constraints)
      Prepares the constraints from the query builder into a QNF compliant condition. If the condition is invalid or trivially false, it returns null.
      类型参数:
      E -
      参数:
      tx -
      constraints -
      返回:
      另请参阅:
      isQueryNormalForm(org.janusgraph.graphdb.query.condition.Condition)
